---
title: CSS Tarot card
description: Pure CSS Tarot card 'Three of Swords' depicting a heart pierced by three swords, surrounded by clouds and rain. Using and extending CodePen's challenge palette 'Perfect Purple'. The card flips on hover!
image:  data:image/png;base64,
date: 2023-10-01
rss: true
style: '
    .csstarot {
      background: #e2a9e5;
      background: radial-gradient(ellipse at center, #e2a9e5 0%, #d582d9 100%);
      align-items: center;
      display: flex;
      height: 100vh;
      max-height: 1000px;
      min-height: 600px;
      border-radius: 0.75rem;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    span {
      display: inline-block;
    }

    .tarot-card {
      backface-visibility: hidden;
      border-radius: 10px;
      height: 100%;
      position: absolute;
      transition: transform 1s cubic-bezier(0.5, 0.59, 0.44, 1.11);
      width: 100%;
    }

    .tarot-card-wrap {
      width: 300px;
      height: 530px;
      position: relative;
      perspective: 1200px;
    }

    .tarot-card-wrap:hover .tarot-card.front,
    .tarot-card-wrap:focus .tarot-card.front,
    .tarot-card-wrap:active .tarot-card.front {
      transform: rotateY(180deg);
    }

    .tarot-card-wrap:hover .tarot-card.front~.back,
    .tarot-card-wrap:focus .tarot-card.front~.back,
    .tarot-card-wrap:active .tarot-card.front~.back {
      transform: rotateY(0deg);
    }

    .tarot-card.front {
      background: #632c65;
      background: repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg, #632c65, #632c65 10px, #602a61 10px, #602a61 20px);
      border: 20px solid #fff;
      transform-origin: center;
    }

    .tarot-card.back {
      background: #4b384c;
      background: radial-gradient(ellipse at center, #684e69 0%, #4b384c 100%);
      border: 20px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, .9);
      transform: rotateY(-180deg);
      z-index: 1;
    }

    .roman-numerals {
      width: 30px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      padding: 20px 0;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-around;
    }

    .roman-numerals span {
      height: 25px;
      width: 2px;
      background-color: #fff;
      position: relative;
    }

    .roman-numerals span::before,
    .roman-numerals span::after {
      content: "";
      width: calc(100% + 10px);
      height: 2px;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      background: #fff;
    }

    .roman-numerals span::after {
      top: auto;
      bottom: 0;
    }

    .clouds {
      height: 200px;
      overflow: visible;
      position: relative;
      width: 260px;
    }

    .clouds span {
      background: #863b89;
      border-radius: 100%;
    }

    .clouds span:nth-of-type(1) {
      bottom: 0;
      height: 100px;
      left: 3px;
      position: absolute;
      width: 100px;
    }

    .clouds span:nth-of-type(2) {
      bottom: 0;
      height: 180px;
      left: 20%;
      position: absolute;
      width: 160px;
    }

    .clouds span:nth-of-type(3) {
      bottom: 0;
      height: 120px;
      position: absolute;
      right: 3px;
      width: 120px;
    }

    .stabbed-heart {
      top: 70%;
      transform: translatey(-30%);
    }

    .heart {
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      width: 200px;
    }

    .heart span {
      background: #ff5495;
      border-radius: 100%;
      height: 100px;
      width: 100px;
    }

    .bottom-of-my-heart {
      background: none;
      border: 90px solid transparent;
      border-radius: 0;
      border-top-color: #ff5495;
      left: 50%;
      margin-top: 80px;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 0;
      z-index: 99999;
    }

    .bottom-of-my-heart .wound {
      width: 50px;
      height: 40px;
      position: absolute;
      background: #ff5495;
      top: -99px;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      border-radius: 100px 100px 0 0;
      border-top: 2px solid #c92f6a;
    }

    .bottom-of-my-heart .wound::before {
      content: "";
      width: 33px;
      height: 18px;
      background: #ff5495;
      position: absolute;
      top: -6px;
      left: -25px;
      border-radius: 100px 100px 0 0;
      transform: rotate(-35deg);
      border-top: 2px solid #bd2660;
    }

    .bottom-of-my-heart .wound::after {
      content: "";
      width: 33px;
      height: 24px;
      background: #ff5495;
      position: absolute;
      top: -10px;
      right: -35px;
      border-radius: 100px 100px 0 0;
      transform: rotate(23deg);
      border-top: 2px solid #bd2660;
    }

    .swords {
      left: 50%;
      position: relative;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      width: 200px;
    }

    .swords .one,
    .swords .two,
    .swords .three {
      display: inline-block;
      transform-origin: left;
      width: 55px;
    }

    .swords .one .hilt,
    .swords .two .hilt,
    .swords .three .hilt {
      background: #ffd85b;
      height: 60px;
      left: 50%;
      position: relative;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      width: 20px;
    }

    .swords .one .hilt::after,
    .swords .two .hilt::after,
    .swords .three .hilt::after {
      background: #ffd85b;
      border: 2px solid #ffcc28;
      border-radius: 20px;
      content: "";
      height: 10px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 50px;
    }

    .swords .one .guard,
    .swords .two .guard,
    .swords .three .guard {
      background: #ffd85b;
      bottom: 0;
      height: 20px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 60px;
    }

    .swords .one .guard::before,
    .swords .two .guard::before,
    .swords .three .guard::before {
      background: #ffd85b;
      border: 2px solid #ffcc28;
      border-radius: 100%;
      content: "";
      height: 26px;
      left: -7px;
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translatey(-50%);
      width: 15px;
    }

    .swords .one .guard::after,
    .swords .two .guard::after,
    .swords .three .guard::after {
      background: #ffd85b;
      border: 2px solid #ffcc28;
      border-radius: 100%;
      content: "";
      height: 26px;
      position: absolute;
      right: -7px;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translatey(-50%);
      width: 15px;
    }

    .swords .one .blade,
    .swords .two .blade,
    .swords .three .blade {
      background: #e8ecf2;
      border-left: 1px solid rgba(99, 44, 101, .2);
      border-right: 1px solid rgba(99, 44, 101, .2);
      height: 200px;
      left: 50%;
      position: relative;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      width: 20px;
    }

    .swords .one .blade::after,
    .swords .two .blade::after,
    .swords .three .blade::after {
      background: #c7d1e0;
      content: "";
      height: 190px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translate(-50%, 10px);
      width: 1px;
    }

    .swords .one .blade span,
    .swords .two .blade span,
    .swords .three .blade span {
      border: 11px solid transparent;
      border-top: 20px solid #e8ecf2;
      bottom: -30px;
      left: -1px;
      position: absolute;
    }

    .swords .one {
      transform: rotate(30deg) translate(70px, -80px);
    }

    .swords .two {
      transform: rotate(0deg) translate(14px, -50px);
    }

    .swords .three {
      transform: rotate(-30deg) translate(-50px, -30px);
    }

    .blood {
      background: #ff2175;
      border-radius: 100%;
      height: 20px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 20px;
    }

    .blood::before {
      background: #ff2175;
      border-radius: 100%;
      content: "";
      height: 5px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      top: -25px;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 5px;
    }

    .blood::after {
      border: 10px solid transparent;
      border-bottom: 20px solid #ff2175;
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      top: -22px;
    }

    .insignia {
      height: 200px;
      left: 50%;
      position: relative;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    }

    .insignia .wands {
      background: #ffcc28;
      height: 200px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: rotate(45deg) translateX(-50%);
      transform-origin: left;
      width: 5px;
    }

    .insignia .swords {
      background: #ffcc28;
      height: 200px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: rotate(-45deg) translateX(-50%);
      transform-origin: left;
      width: 5px;
    }

    .insignia .swords::after {
      background: #ffcc28;
      bottom: 25%;
      content: "";
      height: 5px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 30px;
    }

    .insignia .pentacles {
      border: 5px solid #ffcc28;
      border-radius: 100%;
      bottom: -20px;
      height: 40px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 40px;
    }

    .insignia .cups {
      border: 5px solid #ffcc28;
      border-bottom-left-radius: 40px;
      border-bottom-right-radius: 40px;
      border-top: 0;
      height: 40px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      top: -20px;
      transform: translatex(-50%);
      width: 40px;
    }'
---
